page.title: 04LANGHOLM'S HERITAGE
page.content: IN 1769 {JOHN MALCOLM} WAS BORN.HE WAS A MAJOR GENERAL IN THE ARMY.WHEN HE DIED THE PEOPLE OF LANGHOLM BUILT A{MONUMENT}.IT IS 30 METRES TALL AND BUILT ON{WHITA HILL}WHICH IS 355 METRES ABOVE SEA LEVEL.{SIR JOHN {MALCOLM},WHO WAS BURIED IN{WESTMINSTER {ABBEY},HAD A BROTHER CALLED{SIR {PULTENEY MALCOLM.}HE WAS BORN IN 1768 AND DIED IN 1838.THERE IS A STATUE IN LANGHOLM OF HIM.{NEIL ARMSTRONG}WAS THE FIRST MAN ON THE MOON.HIS ANCESTORS CAME FROM LANGHOLM AND THERE IS A PLAQUE IN THE CHURCH CONCERNING HIS VISIT TO LANGHOLM.HE WAS THE FIRST FREE MAN OF LANGHOLM.{WILLIAM {JULIUS MICKLE}WAS A POET WHO LIVED FROM 1734 TO 1788.{HUGH McDIARMID}WAS ALSO A LANGHOLM POET.{THOMAS TELFORD} WAS FAMOUS FOR BUILDING ROADS AND BRIDGES.HE STARTED AS AN APPRENTICE ON LANGHOLM'S {TOWNHEAD BRIDGE}.
